patthana1.7:2.1_0: Savitakkasavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—savitakkasavicāraṁ

patthana1.7:5.1_4: paṭicca dve khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ.

patthana1.7:261.1_2: atthiyā natthiyā vigate avigate sabbattha ekādasa.
patthana1.7:264.1: Nahetuyā cha, naadhipatiyā ekādasa, napurejāte ekādasa, napacchājāte ekādasa, naāsevane ekādasa, nakamme satta, navipāke ekādasa, najhāne ekaṁ, namagge cha, navippayutte ekādasa.
patthana1.7:268.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe cha …pe… purejāte cha, āsevane pañca, kamme cha …pe… jhāne cha, magge tīṇi, sampayutte cha …pe… avigate cha.
patthana1.7:271.1: Savitakkasavicāro dhammo savitakkasavicārassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— savitakkasavicārā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe….
patthana1.7:272.1: Savitakkasavicāro dhammo avitakkavicāramattassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—savitakkasavicārā hetū vitakkassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe….
patthana1.7:273.1_0: Savitakkasavicāro dhammo avitakkaavicārassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— savitakkasavicārā
patthana1.7:273.1_1: hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe savitakkasavicārā
patthana1.7:274.1_0: Savitakkasavicāro dhammo savitakkasavicārassa ca avitakkaavicārassa ca dhammassa
patthana1.7:274.1_1: hetupaccayena paccayo—savitakkasavicārā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca
patthana1.7:274.1_2: rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe savitakkasavicārā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ
patthana1.7:274.1_3: khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.7:275.1_0: Savitakkasavicāro dhammo avitakkavicāramattassa ca avitakkaavicārassa ca dhammassa
patthana1.7:275.1_1: hetupaccayena paccayo—savitakkasavicārā hetū vitakkassa cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ
patthana1.7:275.1_2: hetupaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe savitakkasavicārā hetū vitakkassa kaṭattā

patthana1.7:276.1_1: hetupaccayena paccayo—savitakkasavicārā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ vitakkassa
patthana1.7:276.1_2: ca hetupaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe savitakkasavicārā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ
patthana1.7:277.1_0: Savitakkasavicāro dhammo savitakkasavicārassa ca avitakkavicāramattassa ca avitakkaavicārassa

patthana1.7:277.1_3: savitakkasavicārā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ vitakkassa ca kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ
patthana1.7:278.1_0: Avitakkavicāramatto dhammo avitakkavicāramattassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—avitakkavicāramattā
patthana1.7:278.1_1: hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe avitakkavicāramattā
patthana1.7:279.1_0: Avitakkavicāramatto dhammo avitakkaavicārassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— avitakkavicāramattā
patthana1.7:279.1_1: hetū vicārassa cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana1.7:279.1_2: avitakkavicāramattā hetū vicārassa ca kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana1.7:280.1_2: ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe avitakkavicāramattā
patthana1.7:280.1_3: hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ vicārassa ca kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.7:281.1_0: Avitakkaavicāro dhammo avitakkaavicārassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— avitakkaavicārā
patthana1.7:281.1_1: hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.7:281.1_2: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe avitakkaavicārā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ
patthana1.7:282.1_0: Savitakkasavicāro dhammo savitakkasavicārassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ
patthana1.7:282.1_1: datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ paccavekkhati; pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati;
patthana1.7:282.1_2: savitakkasavicārā jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā, maggā vuṭṭhahitvā, phalā vuṭṭhahitvā phalaṁ
patthana1.7:282.1_3: paccavekkhati. Ariyā pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti,
patthana1.7:282.1_4: pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti. Savitakkasavicāre khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato
patthana1.7:282.1_5: vipassanti assādenti abhinandanti; taṁ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati …pe… domanassaṁ uppajjati.
patthana1.7:282.1_6: Savitakkasavicāre khandhe ārabbha savitakkasavicārā khandhā uppajjanti.

patthana1.7:290.1_2: cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti, cetopariyañāṇena avitakkaavicāracittasamaṅgissa
patthana1.7:290.1_3: cittaṁ jānāti. Ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ viññāṇañcāyatanassa …pe… ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa
patthana1.7:290.1_4: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Rūpāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe… phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa
patthana1.7:290.1_5: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Avitakkaavicārā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa,
patthana1.7:290.1_7: paccayo. Avitakkaavicāre khandhe ca vicārañca ārabbha avitakkaavicārā khandhā uppajjanti.

patthana1.7:291.1_1: avitakkaavicārā jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā, maggā vuṭṭhahitvā, phalā vuṭṭhahitvā phalaṁ paccavekkhanti;
patthana1.7:291.1_2: taṁ ārabbha savitakkasavicārā khandhā uppajjanti. Ariyā nibbānaṁ paccavekkhanti,

patthana1.7:292.1_0: Avitakkaavicāro dhammo avitakkavicāramattassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā

patthana1.7:294.1_1: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā avitakkaavicārā jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā, maggā vuṭṭhahitvā,

patthana1.7:294.1_9: ārabbha savitakkasavicārā khandhā ca vitakko ca uppajjanti.

patthana1.7:303.1_0: Savitakkasavicāro dhammo savitakkasavicārassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana1.7:303.1_1: sahajātādhipati. Ārammaṇādhipati—dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā
patthana1.7:303.1_2: taṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati; pubbe suciṇṇāni garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati. Savitakkasavicārā
patthana1.7:303.1_3: jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā, maggā vuṭṭhahitvā, phalā vuṭṭhahitvā phalaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati.
patthana1.7:303.1_4: Savitakkasavicāre khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati; taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo
